install.title: Install Our App

description.default: For the best experience, we recommend adding the shettayyy app to your home screen!

ios.title: To install this app on iOS:

steps.1: Tap the Share button in Safari
steps.2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

ios.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

android.step1: Tap the menu button in your browser
android.step2: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"

install.learnMore: Learn more about installing the app

installGuide.title: Install App Guide
installGuide.description: Follow these video guides to install our app on your device. Select your platform to see relevant instructions.
installGuide.noGuides: No installation guides available for the selected platform.

errorList.item3: There was a technical issue during sign-in

PrivacyPolicyPage.introText: At Edenomics, we take your privacy and the security of your financial data extremely seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our personal finance management application.

useInfoList.item1: Provide and maintain our financial management services
useInfoList.item2: Generate spending analysis and budget recommendations
useInfoList.item5: Ensure the security of your account

securityList.item1: End-to-end encryption for all financial data
securityList.item2: Regular security audits and penetration testing
securityList.item3: Secure data storage using industry-standard protocols

PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

sharingList.item3: With service providers under strict confidentiality agreements
sharingList.item4: In case of a merger or acquisition (with prior notice)

PrivacyPolicyPage.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:
PrivacyPolicyPage.footerText: This privacy policy is subject to change. We will notify you of any material changes via email or through our application.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Edenomics ("App"), you agree to bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access or use our services. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, with notice provided through the App or via email.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.intro: Edenomics is a personal finance management application that provides:
description.disclaimer: While we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of any financial information provided through the App.

items.item1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
items.item2: You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized access or use
items.item3: You are responsible for all activities under your account
items.item4: You must use strong, unique passwords and enable two-factor authentication when available

items.item1: Attempting to bypass any security features
items.item2: Using the App for any illegal purposes
items.item4: Attempting to access other user's accounts

dataPrivacy.title: 4. Data and Privacy
dataPrivacy.intro: Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By using the App, you agree that:

items.item1: We may collect and process your financial data as described in our Privacy Policy
items.item2: You grant us a license to use your data to provide and improve our services
items.item3: You are responsible for the accuracy of data you provide
items.item4: We may share anonymized, aggregated data for analytics purposes

liability.title: 5. Liability and Disclaimers
liability.disclaimer: THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF KIND.

items.item1: We are not responsible for financial losses resulting from use of the App
items.item2: We do not provide financial advice - all insights are for informational purposes only
items.item3: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service in the last 12 months
items.item4: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.intro: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services:

items.item1: Without prior notice for violations of these terms
items.item4: If required by law or regulation

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of the App, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, and software, are the exclusive property of Edenomics and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Edenomics maintains its principal place of business, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising from or relating to these Terms shall first be attempted to be resolved through informal negotiation. If the dispute cannot be resolved through negotiation within 30 days, both parties agree to resolve the dispute through arbitration in accordance with the UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules. The language of arbitration shall be English. Nothing in these Terms prevents us from seeking injunctive relief in any applicable jurisdiction where immediate relief is necessary to protect our interests.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

TermsOfServicePage.footer: By using Edenomics, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
